resources: Gastronomía GPS Get to know and enjoy Apozol in the best way! Tacos Gorditas Seafood Others Favorites Start Cenaduría Valadez In the main square, in front of the Church 467 100 8391 Steak, meat, chorizo ​​and tripe tacos Saturday and Sunday from 7:00 pm to 12:00 am Taquería Bere On the side of cyber Maya IT 467 105 5476 Steak, carnaza and roast tacos Saturday and Sunday from 7:00 pm to 11:00 pm Tacos Nolo Mixton Store Front 467 100 5749 Steak, pastor and barbecue tacos Saturday and Sunday from 8:00 am to 12:00 pm Carnitas El Marro In front of the command 467 103 2176 "Carnitas tacos and tortas " Saturday and Sunday from 8:00 am to 12:00 pm Rinconcito La Esperanza Next to Pátula Taxis 467 100 2134 Steak and meat tacos and quesadillas Monday - Friday from 8:00 pm to 11:30 pm Gorditas Cinthya Guadalajara-Saltillo Highway Km 125 Meat and cheese gorditas and toasts, gilded potato tacos Monday - Friday from 8:00 am to 12:30 pm 467 102 9435 Gorditas rellenas Coco Allende Street #3, Apozol, Zac. Gorditas stuffed with green pork rinds, ribs, loin, Mexican-style egg, nopales and chilaquiles Monday - Friday from 8:00 am to 1:30 pm 467 105 9985 Mariscos El Masky Guadalajara-Saltillo Highway Km 130 All types of seafood, cuts of meat, pizzas and hamburgers\ Monday - Sunday from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm 467 952 0745 El Rey del Marisco Guadalajara-Saltillo Highway Km 140 All types of seafood, breakfasts, burritos and burgers Monday - Sunday from 11:00 am to 7:00 pm 467 952 6582 Snack Bar 21 siete Guadalajara-Saltillo Highway Km 132 Wings, boneless, fries, burgers and cocktails Thursday - Sunday from 7:00 pm to 12:00 pm 467 103 2538 Snack Caffe Frappe Main square, in front of the Leobardo Reynoso school Hot coffee, cold coffee, frappes, Italian sodas and ice cream Monday - Sunday from 5:00 pm to 10:30 pm 467 102 1468 Rapados Arco In the Arco, in front of the cyber Maya TI Rascados of different flavors, duritos, salchipulpos, tostilocos, prepared pork rinds Monday - Sunday from 5:00 pm to 10:30 pm 467 103 5179 Elotes y Chascas Eva Benito Juarez Street #34, Apozol, Zac. Corn, chascas, raspados, dorillocos and duritos Monday - Sunday from 6:00 pm to 11:00 pm 467 105 6728 Lochería El Marro Guadalajara-Saltillo Highway Km 126 Burritos, synchronized, sandwich and tortas Monday - Friday from 8:00 am to 12:00 pm 467 102 4598
